name: @mcdc-convention-voting/server
description: Express server with PostgreSQL for MCDC Convention Voting System

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: cp -r src/database/migrations dist/database/ && cp -r src/database/initialization dist/database/ && cp -r src/database/queries dist/database/
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:ci: vitest run --config vitest.config.ts && vitest run --config vitest.config.integration.ts --run
